00133 void PluginManager::LoadAvailablePlugins( QDir pluginsDirectory )
00134 {
00135         QStringList filesList;
00136         BuildFileList( pluginsDirectory, filesList );
00137         foreach( QString fileName, filesList ) LoadTonatiuhPlugin( fileName );
00138 }
00139 
00143 void PluginManager::AddFilesToList( QDir directory, QStringList& filesList )
00144 {
00145         QString directoryPath( directory.absolutePath().append( QLatin1String( "/" ) ) );
00146 
00147     QStringList filenamesList = directory.entryList( QDir::Files, QDir::Unsorted );
00148     for( int i = 0; i < filenamesList.size(); ++i )
00149         filesList << ( directoryPath + filenamesList[i] );
00150 }
00151 
00152 
00157 void PluginManager::BuildFileList( QDir directory, QStringList& filesList )
00158 {
00159         AddFilesToList( directory, filesList );
00160 
00161         QString directoryPath( directory.absolutePath().append( QLatin1String( "/" ) ) );
00162     QStringList subdirectoriesList = directory.entryList( QDir::Dirs, QDir::Unsorted );
00163 
00164    for( int i = 0; i< subdirectoriesList.size(); ++i )
00165    {
00166         QString subdirectoryName = subdirectoriesList[i];
00167                 if( ValidDirectoryName( subdirectoryName ) )
00168                         BuildFileList( QDir( directoryPath + subdirectoryName ), filesList );
00169         }
00170 
00171 }
00172 
00173 void PluginManager::LoadMaterialPlugin( QObject* plugin )
00174 {
00175 
00176         TMaterialFactory* pTMaterialFactory = qobject_cast<TMaterialFactory* >( plugin );
00177         if( !pTMaterialFactory )  tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::LoadPlugins: Material plug-in not recognized" );
00178         pTMaterialFactory->CreateTMaterial();
00179         m_materialFactoryList.push_back( pTMaterialFactory );
00180 }
00181 
00182 void PluginManager::LoadPhotonMapPlugin( QObject* plugin )
00183 {
00184         TPhotonMapFactory* pTPhotonMapFactory = qobject_cast<TPhotonMapFactory* >( plugin );
00185         if( !pTPhotonMapFactory ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::LoadPlugins: PhotonMap plug-in not recognized" );;
00186         m_photonmapFactoryList.push_back( pTPhotonMapFactory );
00187 }
00188 
00192 void PluginManager::LoadRandomDeviatePlugin( QObject* plugin )
00193 {
00194         RandomDeviateFactory* pRamdomDeviateFactory = qobject_cast<RandomDeviateFactory* >( plugin );
00195         m_RandomDeviateFactoryList.push_back( pRamdomDeviateFactory );
00196 
00197 }
00198 
00199 void PluginManager::LoadShapePlugin( QObject* plugin )
00200 {
00201         TShapeFactory* pTShapeFactory = qobject_cast<TShapeFactory* >( plugin );
00202         if ( !pTShapeFactory ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::LoadPlugins: Shape plug-in not recognized" );
00203         //if( pTShapeFactory->IsFlat() )        m_TFlatShapeFactoryList.push_back( pTShapeFactory );
00204         pTShapeFactory->CreateTShape();
00205         m_shapeFactoryList.push_back( pTShapeFactory );
00206 }
00207 
00208 void PluginManager::LoadSunshapePlugin( QObject* plugin )
00209 {
00210     TSunShapeFactory* pTSunShapeFactory = qobject_cast<TSunShapeFactory* >( plugin );
00211     if( !pTSunShapeFactory ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::LoadPlugins: SunShape plug-in not recognized" );                    ;
00212         pTSunShapeFactory->CreateTSunShape( );
00213         m_sunshapeFactoryList.push_back( pTSunShapeFactory );
00214 }
00215 
00216 void PluginManager::LoadTrackerPlugin( QObject* plugin )
00217 {
00218     TTrackerFactory* pTTrackerFactory = qobject_cast< TTrackerFactory* >( plugin );
00219     if( !pTTrackerFactory ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::LoadPlugins: Tracker plug-in not recognized" );
00220         pTTrackerFactory->CreateTTracker( );
00221         m_trackerFactoryList.push_back( pTTrackerFactory );
00222 }

00224 
00228 void PluginManager::LoadTonatiuhPlugin( const QString& fileName )
00229 {
00230         QPluginLoader loader( fileName );
00231     QObject* plugin = loader.instance();
00232     if ( plugin != 0)
00233     {
00234         if( plugin->inherits( "RandomDeviateFactory" ) ) LoadRandomDeviatePlugin( plugin );
00235         if( plugin->inherits( "TShapeFactory" ) ) LoadShapePlugin( plugin );
00236         if( plugin->inherits( "TSunShapeFactory" ) ) LoadSunshapePlugin( plugin );
00237         if( plugin->inherits( "TMaterialFactory" ) ) LoadMaterialPlugin( plugin );
00238         if( plugin->inherits( "TPhotonMapFactory" ) ) LoadPhotonMapPlugin( plugin );
00239         if( plugin->inherits( "TTrackerFactory" ) ) LoadTrackerPlugin( plugin );
00240         }
00241 }
00242 
00247 bool PluginManager::ValidDirectoryName( QString& directoryName  )
00248 {
00249         return ( directoryName != QLatin1String( "." ) ) && ( directoryName != QLatin1String( ".." ) );
00250 }
